I was going to post something very similar to this:
I know I've been argumentative the last couple of days and it's totally cause of political bullshit, but let me summarize: fuck tumblr.

I'm changing my youtube, tumblr and other sites cause someone in question that everyone knows spread my tumblr as a "fuck you for disagreeing with me" -> I received about a hundred messages going "go kill yourself you fucking f*ggot!  F****s are a menace to progressives!"/"Sex is evil!"/"Mutts are cultural appropriation!  Go kill yourself you fucking mutt!"

I have a Facebook account, I never use it anymore though, because it's turned into a cesspool of annoying political/religious things whenever I go to look[/bq]
I was going to post something very similar to this:
I know I've been argumentative the last couple of days and it's totally cause of political bullshit, but let me summarize: fuck tumblr.

I'm changing my youtube, tumblr and other sites cause someone in question that everyone knows spread my tumblr as a "fuck you for disagreeing with me".  I know I've been argumentative the last couple of days, but apparently my tumblr was given out as a "fuck you for disagreeing with me on a social issue".  If the person who did this is currently reading go fuck yourself with a cactus.

Tl:dr; tumblr totally 100% deserves it's negative stigma cause:
Person who disagrees with me on social issues spread my tumblr around as a "fuck you for disagreeing with me" -> I received about a hundred messages going "go kill yourself you fucking f*ggot!  F****s are a menace to progressives!'/"Mutts are cultural appropriation!  Go kill yourself you fucking mutt!"[/bq]

@THAT HAPPENS WHEN YOU ARE FOLLOWING PEOPLE WHO MAKE TOPICS OF THIS@
@YOU CAN UNFOLLOW AND BLOCK THIS TYPE OF MESSAGES, YOU KNOW?@

"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552332826368726e02f40000#post_552332826368726e02f40000
[bq="HJSDGCE"]"@EHAN":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55232e0b63687276ac8f0400#post_55232e0b63687276ac8f0400
True that.
I wish I could just tell them to stop with the political, religious and cultural bullshit.
But I know they'll wipe me off the face of the Earth before they listen.[/bq]
@YOU CAN, JUST UNFOLLOW@[/bq]
But the people who are posting that stuff are in my close family

Like not immediate family, but like my aunts or cousins

They're really not like that in real life though, it's weird

Plus even if they weren't, I wouldn't bother blocking them, I hardly use Facebook anyways and I have no reason to do so these days
